title: Exploring the Educational Value of Nursing Clinical Practice: Work-Integrated Learning (WIL)-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A project evaluating the value of patient-centered learning activities by indirectly experiencing core clinical practices through simulations and real-case analyses using digital devices.

learning_goals: Student nurses can analyze the impact of patient interaction time on learning outcomes in clinical practice.
Student nurses can explain at least three ways performance assessment activities contribute to strengthening job competencies.
Learner groups can submit project deliverables designing patient recruitment activities using digital simulation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
